title: Journalist tracks school board member voting patterns
description: Journalist tracks school board member voting patterns
content:
Scenario: Journalist tracks school board member voting patterns
    Given a board member campaigns on equity platform
    And the journalist investigates whether actions match rhetoric
    When the Observer analyzes 3 years of board voting records
    Then the journalist sees board member voted against equity funding 7 times
    And approved budget cutting programs serving disadvantaged students
    And voted for charter expansion draining district resources
    And identifies pattern of rhetoric contradicting voting record
    And publishes accountability profile exposing hypocrisy
